short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facilitating easy access to essential utilities within the web view for an enhanced user experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Providing essential utilities within the web view for an enhanced user experience like taking quick snaps with just two clicks of the page which they will feel very fun and intuitive and some experimental features that may come in the future but present in the ui as dummies.
